jayawira, ke. wi. nandakumara, susantha dharmapriya, es. ee. premadasa debas patigatha kirima - aar. ee. ranjith perera sakasuma - sarasawi chithragaraya - dalugama sangithaya patigatha kirima - denis rudrigu andum nirmanaya - kanchana thalpawila konda mosthara - lalith dharmawardhana debas kawima - kinsli los, susila rathnayaka, kumari munasinha,sachini nirasha perera, lakshika pranandu, dipal silwa nishpadana sambandhikaranaya - kamal wijesinha nishpadana eekakaya - sarath wirasinha, nawarathna wirasinha, di. ji. sirisena, ajith wijesena, amila munasinha, ayi. ji. samarakon kamara upakarana sapayima - sumiththa entarprayisas, films lokeshan sarwisas, sampath films sarwis nishchala chayarupa - shriyantha walpola, wasantha wittachchi namawaliya - prem disanayaka sangitha adhyakshanaya - aacharya premasiri kemadasa githa prabandhaya - lushan bulathsinhala, aacharya ajantha ranasinha githa - kurullo piyambaa awidin - wiktar wijayantha, kumari munasinha - pada - ajantha ranasinha dilise mangala karanduwa dilise - thrishula abesekara, moris wijesinha - pada - lushan bulathsinhala sewanali kalu adala - thrishula abesekara - pada - lushan bulathsinhala nalu niliyan - anoja wirasinha, kamal addaraaarachchi, wasanthi chathurani, mahendra perera, daya alwis, shriyantha mendis, chandani senawirathna, sunil soma piris, dilki wirasinha, chithra wakishta, rathnawali kakunawela, dinesh priyashad, shashi wijesinha, arun dayas bandaranayaka, sujatha paramanadan, hirantha mahathinthala, sujani menaka, senaka tayitas, kusum renu, mali jayawirage, thamara dilrukshi, upathissa balasuriya, senaka wijayasinha, jagath premalal, teri jayasinha, nimala athapaththu, pramila kuruppu, jayalath pranandu, barnad sho premasundara, kulasiri budawaththa, giwantha arthasad, anupama kemadasa, gamini jayalath, uditha gunarathna, priyantha prabhas, parsi perera, kumara thirimadura, piyarathna wijekon, priyantha samarakon, ruwan madanayaka, sanat dikkumbaura, samudra hikkaduwa liyanage, barti silwa, upul mahanama, pushpakara wanniaarachchi, premakumara dasanayaka, namal sumudu, wasanthi ranwala, wini weththasinha, ayiwan anthani, hasitha samantha pradarshanaya - rigal - kolambaa athulu sambhawya paswana mandalaye sinama shalawaladi age wairaya - 03 thiragatha wu dinaya - 1998 sapthambar 07 idiripath kirima - soniya disa chithrapata nishpadanaya - soniya disanayaka, sunil ti.
